channel.title: Game Closing instead of ending properly
channel.description:
#### What happened? At the end of the game, I got immediately sent to the end screen, and got rewarded 38 gold, and a chat message at the bottom said simply the game was closed. This skipped the part where I would be able to MVP people, and it didn't show any of the participants, so I could not report anyone.
![image|489x499](upload://ban8HfKxH7F7T7eYrDz2tu9KlV2.jpeg)
![image|324x500](upload://1wV7G9eJKa4rKlaXc0tDUB6Sv6q.jpeg)
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The game was supposed to end normally, with BD having won, and I was supposed to be given a chance to mvp people before being given the gold for winning, and then I should have gotten to a screen showing who all the players were and who the three MVPs were. As this was a double gold weekend, I should have gotten 150 gold, not 38.
#### Steps to reproduce: Win the game as mystic against unseen and reaper while playing as mystic and surviving until the end.
#### Comments: This is the second time this has happened to me. It does not happen most games, and I don't know exactly what the conditions are for this happening. I never encountered this problem before the recent king rework.

item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Have you reopened the game since this has happened? If not your logs should still be available on your pc here:

On Windows:

%userprofile%\appdata\LocalLow\Imperium42 Game Studio\Throne of Lies\output_log.txt

On Mac:

~/Library/Logs/Unity/Player.log

On Linux

~/.config/unity3d/Imperium42 Game Studio/Throne of Lies/Player.log

If you can copy them and upload them here, that should help the devs find the problem. If you have opened the game since then they may have been overwritten, so you’ll have to wait for the bug to happen again before uploading them.
